Print

Mo Dan

dcyp@163.com

You can have the best looking app, but if it doesn't work, NO ONE is going to use it.

Lifelong learner.

6 years of interaction design experience, with my own product design methodology and practice in the company.

Self-taught HTML, learned back-end language structure and principles in the work, can communicate with product, UI and development smoothly.

Adhering to the human-centered design approach, mastering the use of SQL, Python and other analysis tools, and still learning.

Focus on sociology, biology, psychology; interested in economics, cognitive science, data Analysis and other fields.

Experiences

  • 2021.8—Present Senior Interaction Designer | UED Division
    上海游犀科技有限公司（原名 上海氪方网络科技有限公司）
    • Mainly responsible for the interaction design of PC, H5 and App of the company's product - "KOL influence trading platform", and participated in the whole process of multiple products from 0 to 1
    • Establish and implement interaction design specifications and workflow specifications
    • Mentor junior interaction designers
    • Work with user researchers to conduct preliminary user research and usability testing
    • Lead user behavior data infrastructure, responsible for interaction design, data burial, data analysis of each operation activity, and output user behavior analysis report
    • To try out innovative projects in line with the company's development direction

    Performance

    • Responsible for the interaction design of 3 product lines at the same time, completing the interaction design work efficiently and with high quality, ensuring the smooth work of upstream and downstream and the final launch
    • In the absence of developer support, I taught myself Google Tag Manager and completed the basic work of data burial independently
    • Learned Three.js in 2 weeks, and successfully presented the virtual human animation designed in the company's innovation project in the web page and implemented simple interaction
    • Lead the learning environment, encourage and guide the UED department to learn the 3D modeling software Blender internally, and successfully practice it in the company's innovation projects
  • 2018.10—2020.12 Interaction Designer | Efficiency and Innovation Division
    瑞格丝（上海）投资有限公司
    • Responsible for product requirement analysis, product research, site visit and prototype design for supply chain collaborative management platform, trade system and customs clearance and forwarding system
    • Guiding the direction of the team in their work, coordinating communication between product, ui designers and developers
    • Formulating interaction design specifications and guiding ui designers to develop visual design specifications
    • Implement human-centered product design methodology, training and implementation
    • Lead the company's data analysis efforts, build data analysis reports for all of the company's product lines using Google analytics and Data Studio, and guide the product manager team in their data analysis efforts
    • Responsible for NLP research and application, Chatbot robot training, data cleaning and categorization, and workflow development
    • Responsible for data validation, requirement communication, interface design and interaction design of BI side (based on Tableau) for group level data warehouse.

    Performance

    • Formed a set of own product design methodology, with the support of CIO, trained and guided the product manager team to practice, and achieved significant results
    • Promote the establishment of data collection and data analysis of the company, using Google analytics and Data Studio to independently build data analysis reports, which are recognized by the company and form the reporting standard, providing effective help to the company management and decision-making.
    • The competitive research done for the company was recognized by the group's decision makers, which helped to develop the direction of the company and was publicly recognized
    • Actively learning SQL, Python for data analysis and data mining, practiced basic data crawling and data analysis using Python in a research project, and conducted training for non-programmers in the company.
    • Propose and promote the practice of "out of the office, field research" and "storytelling method to cultivate empathy and enhance communication" methodology, which has achieved obvious results and has been recognized by the company
    • Independently responsible for NLP research and application, Chatbot robot training, 5 functions are now online
    • Responsible for all design of visual reports at group level from requirement research to final report presentation
  • 2017.10—2018.08 Interaction Designer | Official Website Platform Division
    游族网络
    • All interaction work of the business related to the official website of the Tour
    • Visual UI design advice and guidance
    • Interaction requirements support for other project groups' business within the company
    • User behavior and user psychology analysis

    Performance

    • Independently responsible for the framework construction and interaction design of the company's internal project management platform and successful launch
  • 2016.10—2017.10 Interaction Designer | Product Division
    爱怡康健康科技（上海）有限公司（原名 糖小护健康科技（上海）有限公司）

    上海冀创信息技术有限公司
    • Responsible for 33iq app client ux, ui work, participate in pre-release functional testing, and continuously improve the user experience and new function design of the new version of the client. Currently Android and iOS versions are online and available in the app market
    • Responsible for graphic design of peripheral products and advertisements
  • 2013.01—2015.01 Graphic Designer
    成都斑斓创意有限公司
    • He is mainly responsible for advertising posters, brochures, on-site advertising, outdoor advertising such as property walls and bus stops for two projects of Vanke "Haiyue Huicheng" and "Jinku" in Chengdu.
